RecommendationSystem.Embedder package

Submodules

RecommendationSystem.Embedder.abstract_embedding_model module

class RecommendationSystem.Embedder.abstract_embedding_model.AbstractEmbeddingModel

Bases: ABC

abstract embed(text: str) → Tensor

Computes the embedding for the given text and returns the vector representation :param text: Text that should be embedded :return: Torch tensor with embedding of the given text

RecommendationSystem.Embedder.embedding_model module

class RecommendationSystem.Embedder.embedding_model.EmbeddingModel

Bases: AbstractEmbeddingModel

embed(text: str) → Tensor

Computes the vector representation of the given text :param text: Text that should be embedded :return: Torch tensor with embedding of the given text

RecommendationSystem.Embedder.run_embedder module

RecommendationSystem.Embedder.run_embedder.main() → None

Queries all article and comment nodes from the Neo4J database, calls the embedding method for properties of the nodes that should be embedded and then updates the nodes in the database with the embeddings.
